title: Anyone kind enough to gift me?
body:
I have been saving up for a while now but I haven't been able to afford Yasuo or Diana ad I would really like to play them, neither of them have been on champion rotation recently. If anyone can gift me Yasuo or Diana or give me a unused skin code in oce it would be greatly appreciated.
Add me in game my username is: MachinaDragon358

Thankyou

replies.body: ye nws. ill gif u bof of dem! just gimme ur bank deetales and ur address and ur phone number and we can may-b meet at a park or sumfing
Hey id like the entire shop like I've been saving up for a while but yeah haven't been able to get enough yet add me in game to complete my really obnoxious request!!!!
i mean when i get my money i can gift ya

>neither of them have been on champion rotation recently

.

>Diana

She was free week last month.

I've wanted Rengar for awhile and asked on these Boards; Noone was willing so i highly doubt you'll be able to do -- Just a heads up.

Also, Diana was in one of the Ocean Week Rotations along with Yasuo a month or two ago. Give it a few weeks and they might be on it again.

Or if you really can't wait go out any buy one of those $10 Prepaid Cards. It's enough to get one of them; Heck if any of them are on sale you might even be able to get both.
